p: Medical interventions, including blood transfusion, oxygen, and intravenous antibiotics, were also associated with death on univariate logistic regression. As most of the patients who died were very ill, with advanced KS disease on admission, they were more likely to be commenced on these medical interventions. Therefore, these treatments were only predictors of mortality in the sense that they were likely to be initiated in very ill KS patients who had advanced disease.
